title: Parallel lines
creator_credit: New Zealand National Film Unit, High MacDonald and Larry Nelson
brief_description: An animator’s view of the evolution of life in New Zealand from the earth’s beginnings through to the arrival of the first humans - the Maoris. The art technique used builds on the fluid metamorphosis of parallel lines.
creator_credit_for_label: New Zealand National Film Unit, High MacDonald and Larry Nelson
